participant_1.background:
I have a cat and he is the light of my life.
I sometimes trip over my own feet when I'm playing tennis.
i have 5 brothers and sisters.
my favorite band is the rolling stones.
I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.

participant_2.background:
I am not close with my family and I prefer to spend time alone.
I'm a single mom working two jobs to support my children.
I used to wear a suit every day to work.
i have many girlfriends.
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.

content.text: Hello! I hope you are having a good day.
I am, thanks for asking! I am just getting ready for a long day at work.
Oh, what do you do for work?
I am a single mom, and I work two jobs to support my children.
Wow, that is a lot of work! I am sure your children are very grateful for all that you do for them.
Thank you, I appreciate that. They are my world.
I have five brothers and sisters, so I know how important family is.
That is great! I do not have any siblings, so I am always jealous of people who have big families.
I used to trip over my own feet all the time when I played tennis.
That is funny! I have never been good at tennis either.
My favorite band is the Rolling Stones.
I have never really listened to the Rolling Stones. What is your favorite song by them?
My favorite song is Gimme Shelter.
I will have to check it out.
You should! It is a great song.
